title: Riak Recap for August 19 - 21
description:
Posted on August 22, 2011

Evening, Morning, Afternoon to All -

Very short Recap coming off of the weekend.

Enjoy.

Mark

Riak Recap for August 19 – 21

  1. We announced a Riak 1.0 Webinar. This is happening on Sept 28th and will feature Justin Sheehy and Andy Gross talking about why the next Riak release will be downright amazing.
    → Registration and details here
  2. Q - Is there some way to remove an empty bucket? (via #riak)
    A - If it’s empty, it doesn’t exist. Buckets are just namespaces + properties.
  3. Another reminder that Riak will be the topic of conversation at the
    upcoming Seattle Scalability Meetup this Wednesday.
    → Details here
